And for all the scholarly type who think they know everything, and throw names like Rwanda, Somalia, Bosnia,and Africa, why hate Jews?

The United Nations was formed immediately after WWII, because Hitler went after Jews. The one purpose of the United Nations was to prevent another genocide, or war crimes go unpunished, and enforce global human rights. 

The United Nations has not ever acted to prevent any attempt at genocide or enforce a single human right, but you aren't angry with them, you really don't care because its not at your front door or in your backyard. Yet. 

The United Nations is controlled and dominated by Arab countries who are filthy rich, and kill their own for fun. Why don't they perform? 

And better, why are you too stupid to see  it was the who set-up camp beside the Israeli's hospitals in Haiti after the earthquake?

To sum up the history lesson, Jews are tolerant of others. They help without asking in return. 

Most of you have never knowingly met a Jew before  let alone ever  having a problem with one, so never forget that what the Jews went through prior to death, cannot be compared to any other catastrophe to a people. And always remember that it happened to the Jews first.

The Torah is the scroll of G_d, the Bible was written from the Torah, as the Bible states over and over, no one who believes in either will dispute that. 

Its the haters,who follow scripture that promotes and glorifies terror and death in the name of a g_d. All should beware, as the haters say; "First come Saturday's, then come Sunday's.
